mapper.select: select * from ( select review_no, user_id, review_written_date, review_modify_date, isbn, review_ref, review_title, review_content, review_open, rank() over(partition by isbn order by review_modify_date desc, review_no desc) rk from review_board ) sub, book b where sub.rk = 1 and sub.isbn=b.isbn and user_id = #{user_id}
select count(distinct isbn) from review_board where user_id=#{user_id}
select * from review_board where isbn = #{param1} and user_id = #{param2} order by review_written_date desc
select count(*) from review_board where isbn = #{param2} and user_id = #{param3} order by review_written_date desc
mapper.delete: delete from review_board where user_id=#{user_id} and review_no=#{review_no}
mapper.insert: insert into review_attach(uuid, uploadpath, filename, review_no) values (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{review_no})
mapper.select: select * from review_attach where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy\mm\dd')
